description: These private photography sessions take the chore (and mistakes) out of documenting your visit to Toronto. With a professional photographer dedicated to capturing your every camera-ready move, you'll enjoy each moment instead of scrambling for the photo. You might...maybe...miss asking strangers to take your photo or those charming pictures of your arm with half of an overexposed face. With this experience, you'll get 50 fully-edited digital photos - plenty of perfection for posting, framing and subtly bragging out. Be snapped at famous landmarks, get couple-time that you'll remember, re-enact your favourite sports moments, or step back into Toronto's past.

reviews.title: Discover the gorgeous Toronto
text: I love walking around new places. I think that's the best way to explore them and learn from the experience. But that is even truer if you have an expert guide walking by your side! Dustin loves his job and loves Toronto. He will show you the best of the city, answering all of your questions and giving you lots useful tips. Really enjoyed the experience and definitely recommend you try it yourselves!

reviews.title: Intimate Tour of Toronto
text: On our recent trip to Toronto, my parents and I opted for a walking tour and found Dustin on Trip Advisor.  We had a great time - learned a ton about the city, and in particular discovered intimate details about downtown Toronto that we could never have learned from a guidebook. Dustin also tailored the tour to our interests (as well as our timing) and then followed up with additional ideas for the rest of our stay.  Would highly recommend this tour!

reviews.title: So glad we did this...
text: Dustin was awesome!  My husband wasn't so thrilled that I had booked a walking tour, but quickly changed his mind. Dustin did a great job of finding things we both found interesting.  We are so glad we did this tour.  It was a fabulous way to learn about a city we had never visited.

reviews.title: Did this for our anniversary
text: We had a great time with Dustin touring the city we have live in for many years.  He was very friendly and informative.  He went above and beyond to make the trip enjoyable for us.  He checked out local parking spots and gave us the closest/cheapest option.  He accommodated us and our baby in the stroller.  He took great pictures and made it all fun.  He even spent extra time with us since we were all having a great time and he wanted to make sure we got it all in.  Thank you so much Dustin!!

reviews.title: Great personalized walking tour
text: Lots of information, facts and stories. Gave us extra time because we had our 1 year old with us. Very thoughtful. Paid attention to what we were interested in and gave us more information along those lines. Very knowledge about a wide variety of thinking about Toronto and Canada.

reviews.title: meticulous planning
text: The CEO of this tour, Dustin Fuhs, carefully planned out my route for a two-hour was of the part of Toronto I wanted to see on my visit there at the end of February.  He was also my guide.  He was knowledgeable of history, art, and architecture, and kept up a steady stride on this very cold winter day.  When my fingers started to get frostbitten, he knew just which building to stop in for a quick warm up.  He was prompt and sociable and I couldn't have wished for a better introduction to UofT and nearby history.  He walked me to my next stop on my visit,  followed the tour up with email assistance for the rest of my trip, and sent a dropbox album of photos.  I would be happy to recommend LiveToronto.

reviews.title: Highly Recommended
text: I don't think I could recommend this tour enough.  It was an excellent way to get acquainted with Toronto.  Dustin was a phenomenal guide and seemed genuinely interested in sharing his knowledge of the city.  He was also easy-going and wanted the tour to meet my needs and ensured he showed me landmarks I'd be interested in.  He was super friendly.  I mentioned I had left my ticket to a ball game at the hotel and he found a way for me to print it out so I wouldn't have to go back without me even asking him to do so.  In addition, he sent me links of information and discounts to the attractions I told him I was going to see.  This tour is definitely worth and the time and investment!

reviews.title: The best tour I have ever taken
text: This is an incredible tour and photo shoot combination. I traveled alone to Toronto and did worry about getting photos of myself that weren't selfies, so this tour appealed to me. And yet I had no idea how much more the tour would be. Dustin customized the tour for sites that I would appreciate. It is the home of hockey so that was a focus along with historic buildings. Dustin's passion for the city of Toronto (and hockey) came through at every stop. This is a must-do tour for those who want to learn more about the city than the guidebooks tell you. Also a great idea for those who might want to commemorate a special occasion. The photos Dustin took were amazing.

reviews.title: Great way to start a Toronto Vacation
text: This was the perfect walking tour for our family- which included a 9 month old baby in a stroller. Dustin was awesome about communicating before hand & being flexible with his schedule. I loved having somebody else tell us & show us all the great things to do in such a small area downtown.  He met us at our hotel and was obviously very passionate and knowledgeable about tourists having a great time in his city- even pointing out some local events & tons of discounts/tickets that were available.  It was really great to have somebody else taking some nice & very scenic photos of our family while we were there.  THANKS DUSTIN!

reviews.title: Delightful afternoon in Toronto!!
text: Dustin was very friendly right from the get go! He really wanted to make sure that our Toronto visit had customized pictures.

We came to Toronto while 7 1/2 months pregnant, on our last trip before the baby gets here, and Live Toronto Walking Tour was a great way to commemorate this special time for us. The pictures really turned out great. We can't wait to re-do this tour with our little girl.
Men, if you want to earn some points with your lady and get her some cute pictures, this is a must for a date!!

reviews.title: What a beautiful tour
text: Dustin was very knowledgeable of the downtown Toronto area. My fianc√© and I learned so many amazing things, and saw things on this tour that we would have definitely missed on our own. The tour and photography taken along the way were perfectly timed and extremely helpful. We couldn't have asked for a more beautiful afternoon, and the photography was AMAZING! The tour guide, Dustin was extremely friendly and helpful, even when running into him randomly later in the day after the tour was completed!! I will definitely return to Live Toronto tours, and recommend the company to all of my friends!!!!!

reviews.title: Fun way to view a new city
text: We were visiting from out of town for the first time and our tour with Dustin was a perfect way to view the city, have fun, and leave with great memories. I would highly recommend.

reviews.title: Amazing!
text: We had such an amazing time the first time, we have booked again! It was such an enjoyable evening and our photos were incredible :) I have been recommending this experience to all my family and friends!

reviews.title: What an incredible gift to ourselves!
text: Dustin is incredibly interesting, and makes you very comfortable (I thought an hour with a stranger would be uncomfortable but he's so nice and sociable that it just flew by).  He customized the walk considering our preference towards History.  I thought I'd just be happy with the pictures, but they ended up just being a perk of a very interesting tour!

There were a few more pictures of the city (instead of us) than I'd hoped for, but still so worth it (plus we now have great, professional quality, pictures of TO). He even took a couple "profile photos" of each of us, which is great to have a professional quality picture for work etc. He got the pictures to us the same night (and we went out from 7-8 p.m.) and they're not watermarked, so what you pay for the tour is your only expense - print the photos as many times as you want!
100% worth it, we will be back!

reviews.title: A very unique way to spend an afternoon!
text: My friends and I were in Toronto for a little bachelorette party. There were three of us that did the walking tour. The photos are terrific and we had so much fun! Dustin knew a lot about the city that I had never heard. It's a great walking tour with great photos. It's definitely a unique experience.

reviews.title: Nadeem and Saima's Friday Adventure
text: We had planned this walking tour just to enjoy our evening and did not expect it to be more than just a few pictures and some walking. Dustin was absolutely great. Not only did he meet us 15 minutes before-hand, he even spent 10 extra minutes with us so that we hit all the different spots on our selected route. He even emailed us all our pictures (53 in total) only 2 hours after our tour was over. I would recommend this tour for anyone, especially those who think they know a lot about the wonderful city called Toronto. Not only will you get some amazing pictures, but you will learn a lot about this wonderful city. You will also get an amazing tour guide in the process. Thanks Dustin and keep up the good work. See you soon on another tour.
Nadeem and Saima

reviews.title: A lot of fun ... and awesome pics too
text: My fiancee and I went on the date night tour and even though we live in Toronto, we learned a lot about the city.  Dustin knows so many interesting things about the city.  We really enjoyed the flexibility of the tour which was tailored to our interests.  We definitely recommend this tour.

reviews.title: The Best!
text: We were visiting Toronto to celebrate our wedding anniversary in September 2013 and decided to go on the Date Night Tour with LiveToronto.  We had never been on any type of tour before -  in fact I wasn't even sure if I could convince my husband to go as it would not be something he would normally choose to do.  Upon meeting Dustin I knew that it was going to be fun, it didn't feel awkward as I first thought it might and his knowledge and passion about the area shone through. He showed us parts of the city we would probably never have visited on our own and pointed out interesting facts about buildings which we would never have known. To top it all off, our photos turned out AMAZING! We had them within an hour or so of the tour ending - we got to enjoy looking at them as we had dinner at the CN Tower!
I have suggested this tour to everyone I can and would recommend it to anyone! We plan to return with our kids in tow for some more incredible memories and photos!
Keep up the amazing work Dustin!

reviews.title: Fun, unique and affordable!
text: My fiance and I live/work in Toronto and took the Date Night tour with Dustin (owner and tour guide) a few weekends ago. We loved every bit of it! We used to be one of those people who would say "Toronto sucks, there's nothing to do here". But this tour really opened up our eyes and taught us that there is so much to discover if you just slow down and take the time to soak in what life has to offer! This is a great (and affordable!) activity for both locals and tourists. It is a definite recommendation for couples or friends who want to do something different than the usual eating out, shopping or movie. It's a must for tourists - I wish I had known this company existed before as I always have relatives visit from the states (definitely on the itinerary next time).

The concept is brilliant as the tours are private and cater to your interests. Dustin is very knowledgeable and has really done his research as he has a number of different tours in his back pocket. And because of that, we can look forward to taking tours with LiveToronto again! He also has different TYPES of tours you can check out on their website other than the Date Night (ex: Social Network tour). He will show you "hidden gems" in Toronto that people wouldn't take the time to notice and would just usually walk by. You don't have to worry about holding back a whole tour group to ask anything and Dustin carried out great conversation the whole way through. He also took pictures of us at each location we passed through, which was awesome as it can be difficult to constantly ask random people to take your picture. Dustin also takes great scenic pictures of the different landmarks at each tour stop. Every time I asked him if he took a picture of a particular thing, he'd already beat me to it! The camera Dustin used produced great quality pictures that we definitely uploaded to Facebook and are actually going to use them in our engagement photo slideshow! We learned so many different things about the city we've lived/worked in all our lives and can't wait to book a different tour next time!

reviews.title: Simply fantastic!
text: We had the best time strolling downtown Toronto with Dustin past Sunday evening! My fiance and myself went on this tour expecting nothing more than someone-with-a-camera and we were left amazed. Dustin set us off on his pre-developed route and showed us iconic spots that we had (on several ocassions) walked by without noticing their significance. He had interesting things to point out at every corner and sweet spots for taking the photos. We were amazed how quickly time passed. It's people like Dustin that really help you appreciate how beautiful Toronto is and how many hidden stories there are at every corner. We can't wait to go on a winter stroll again!

reviews.title: Delightful tour!
text: I wasn't quite sure what to expect with this tour but it turned out to be fun and entertaining! Dustin was an excellent tour guide and I learned interesting facts even though I've lived in Toronto for 10 years...I would definitely recommend this experience to tourists and locals. (The pictures were great too!)

reviews.title: Amazing Experience
text: Great guy, knows his way around town. Very professional, great with kids. Will definitely be doing more tours with him. We will recommend him to friends and family.

reviews.title: Such a fun and great time!
text: We had such an amazing experience on this walking tour. Dustin was a complete gem and made us feel so comfortable doing something that he is truly fantastic at. I would highly recommend this experience to anyone!

reviews.title: Literally the most memorable date I have ever been on!
text: The excitement for this date began when I booked it months before it happened.  Then the day had come and my boyfriend and I were brimming with wonder.  We have never done anything, and the concept is really so cool.  Toronto is a doorstep away really, but I haven't seen much of it to be honest.  So for me, this was an occasion to take in a city that for me before was too big, had too many people, and many more too's.

We met Dustin at the front of Osgoode Hall.  This building was rich in history, you can just feel it, let alone see it.  I was feeling the bubbling of excitement, because I have loved architecture for most of my life.

Dustin was a person who instantly wants to make you feel comfortable.  He has a nice smile and engages in conversation with ease.  After deciding which tour we would like to take, there are three to choose from, off we went walking.  Now I must admit that the weather was amazing, and lent to the delight of the evening.  Our walk was scheduled for 7pm, perfect as it turned out.

We chose the University of Toronto route, and we weren't disappointed.  Dustin led us through pathways that I would have never chosen.  He took pictures where I wouldn't have thought likely.  His knowledge was fascinating, and I found myself loving every minute of the walk.  We laughed and were silly at times, and it was all captured by the skill Dustin has with his camera.

After we finished our tour, a city I once kept at bay became more to me.  We walked through Yorkville and my breath was taken away.  The opulence, the grandeur, the experience impacted me.  The whole night left me feeling airy and happy.

Who could ask for a better way to spend time?!  I recommend this for anyone wanting to capture special moments with anyone else.  I will be booking a tour with my best friend, maybe even all of them.  Dustin even takes families on tour, can you imagine capturing stunning pictures of your family visit, or just a stroll with your child or children.
For me, the pictures brought me to tears when I saw them.  Thank you Dustin!!!!!

reviews.title: Fun day out
text: I decided to book the Date Night Tour, as a surprise to my husband and just to do something different.  Dustin was a great host, very knowledgeable, fun, and full of tidbits about the city and locations we visited. My husband and I had great fun posing for all the pictures, (even the cheesy ones!) and leaning new things about some of the historic buildings around town.    As he had promised, I received the pictures within 24 hrs, and we were very pleased with the results and quality of the images.   This is a great alternative to studio engagement pictures, you walk a bit, pose a bit, laugh a lot :-).  Thank you Dustin , I may be booking a second tour soon !..  AB & P.

reviews.title: It's unique, it's fun... it's AWESOME
text: Dustin is awesome! Thank you for giving my fiance and I such a great experience. Not just that we had lots of laughs, but also wonderful memories with lovely photos. Dustin personalized each tour to suit each person's needs and interests. Definitely NOT one of those standard tours that everyone gets the same experience. Totally recommend this tour.

reviews.title: Awesome!
text: Dustin was great and my tour was awesome. I would definitely recommend this romantic date night walküëç

reviews.title: Wonderfully fun & unique experience
text: This tour did not disappoint.  Not only did my boyfriend and I see and learn new things, we now have a beautiful collection of photos and memories.  Dustin certainly is a great guide!  It was the perfect way to spend our Saturday date night and a wonderful early birthday present from my boyfriend.  I would highly recommend this tour to anyone, and we hope to do another one in the future.

reviews.title: Awesome tour with awesome company!
text: My boyfriend and I had an amazing time on the tour with Dustin! It's not the standard tour where everyone has the same experience. Dustin really tailors the tour to you and what you're interested in. He made sure to give us options as to where we wanted to start and end the tour so right from the start, Dustin had already allowed us to have a say in the route we were about to take! We often take walks ourselves but they've always been quite aimless. Dustin guided us along routes that we had never even thought of taking and never was it a dull moment! We learned so much and he truly is an awesome person to be with. We found Dustin to be super personable and engaging! Thank you for giving us such an awesome experience filled with memories and lovely photos! It was an amazing way to start the day and we will definitely be recommending you to everyone - full stars all the way!!

reviews.title: Fantastic!!
text: My boyfriend and I had a great time on the date night tour. Dustin is very personable, knowledgeable, and can answer any question you have about the city! Learned a lot of new things I never knew about Toronto! The pictures were also really well done and were edited and sent within 2 hours of the tour. Great way to learn new facts about the city of Toronto and to have a great date night with tons of pictures. Would definitely recommend this tour to anyone!

reviews.title: 5 stars!
text: I booked this tour as I was travelling alone and so wanted some photos that weren't selfies! I got to the meeting point 15 minutes early and Dustin was waiting for me so we set off straightaway. He was really easy to chat to and it didn't feel awkward. He definitely knows his stuff about the city! We walked around and he told me all about the things we were seeing and every now and then we would stop for some photos. We finished along the waterfront and then went into a shopping centre where he found some leaflets and went through different things for me to do during the rest of my stay which I really appreciated! Overall the tour lasted half an hour longer than I expected which was an added bonus. I got the email with a link to my photos the next day and they really are great! There were all the photos of myself and then lots of various sights around the city too. This was a great way to see the city from a different perspective and not like the usual touristy tours. Plus there was no single person supplement so was a good bargain especially for all the photos! Would definitely recommend this to anyone!

reviews.title: Great way to spend an evening!
text: I would recommend this tour to anyone...especially if you have that special someone!
I work down town and learnt many things i didn't know or maybe would have never known if i didn't take this tour!
Dustin was a gracious host and excellent photographer....my fiance and i never felt as though the tour was rehearsed and it flowed naturally with no awkward moments.
5 stars and 2 thumbs up Dustin!!!! Thanks again!

reviews.title: Super fun & informative way to see the Tdot!
text: Money & time well spent! I was amazed how much Dustin fit into our hour of touring "the waterfront". We had a blast with him, being tourists in our own city. Dustin is a delight & a wealth of knowledge. We learnt so much about our city. It was fun and relaxed. Dustin snapped pics of us along the way. We were thrilled with the high quality photos we promptly received. We plan to do the "ROM/ UofT" tour next. We highly recommend Live Toronto Walking Tours to not only visitors but also to Torontonians. You'll be glad you did! W&M Aug 2014

reviews.title: Fantastic Afternoon Walking Tour
text: My partner and I booked a walking tour of Old Toronto and the St. Lawrence Market area using our Samba Days package.  This was an area that was fairly new to us and we had a great time discovering this part of Toronto.  We started at Osgood hall near the old and new City Halls and finished off at St. Lawrence Market.  Dustin was a fantastic tour guide; he was informative and entertaining.  The cool part was getting a set of photos taken of us along the way.  It was a photos hoot and tour all rolled into one.
We would definitely consider booking another tour!
FYI there is a bit of walking, but it's worth it!

reviews.title: A Walk To Remember
text: Our date night tour was awesome!! We had beautiful weather and a cool tour guide and photographer rolled up in one!! We were amazed by Dustin's photography talent, attention to detail, and likeable personality. He' was very knowledgable about Toronto's historical sites, entertainment locations, and scenic locations. We learned and saw a lot of fascinating venues, historical places, and took some beautiful memorable photos. The walk was pleasant, and we enjoyed the great interactive conversation and laid back atmosphere he created. An hour went by quickly, but it was so fun! He made us feel very comfortable.  We would highly recommend this date night tour to all of our friends. It was a sweet little date with fantastic quality photos included.  Thanks so much and Blessings in all you do Dustin!!! D&S xo

reviews.title: A Lovely Afternoon Stroll in Toronto
text: My girlfriend and I wanted to get some unique and fun photos on a summer day and also learn more about the city we live/work in...we accomplished both!! I highly recommend this! Dustin is a fantastic tour guide and really fun to be around (and easy to get along with) The photos were not cliche, but unique and customized to our preferences. I would consider even doing this again. Thank you!

reviews.title: A perfect way to spend an evening in Toronto!!
text: My fianc√© and I wanted to do something different on our vacation in Toronto so we looked into some touristy things to do.
We happened upon a groupon for a private walking tour with a photographer, and am I ever glad we did.
After meeting up with our guide, Dustin, we headed off for a very informative and interesting tour of downtown Toronto. Complete with professional photography!!

It was a truly fantastic evening and not only do I recommend this to anyone, I will do it the next time we are in the city as there are 45 different routes to choose from and some much more to learn and experience.
Thank you Dustin!!

reviews.title: What a great date night :)
text: Had a fantastic evening, Dustin is extremely knowledge and fun. It was a great way to see the city and get some great pictures that we would not have been able to capture ourselves. This was our first family vacation and this experience made the trip. Thank you again Dustin again for your time and expertise.

reviews.title: Great Attraction
text: Thank you for the great tour!
Would recommend it for people who are looking for this service.
Thank you for the great service.
R

reviews.title: Enjoyable way to get good pics!
text: Do you never think to take photos of you and your significant other when you are out on the town and looking good? Are all your photos together poorly composed and boring because they are taken by a friend or random passer by? Do your photos together have that distinct "selfie" look with strange expressions and hunched up body angles to try to disguise the fact that one of you is holding the phone?

If so, then you need LiveToronto and Dustin! His 15000 photos, hundreds of hours and kilometers of experience mean you get great photos with cool backdrops all over this great city. Did I mention you also get a fun and interesting tour that caters to your particular interests? You will wonder where the time went as you are entertained, informed, gently papparazzi'd and then left feeling the glow or warm attention and good times. Awesome photos follow in the days to come to allow you to re-live the experience and revel in your collective beauty!
Great way to start a date night, capture your Toronto visit or celebrate a big event! Thanks Dustin!
